channel.title: My First Mod(tm): S.A.M. in the M.A.M
channel.description:
[S.A.M. Converter by GenghisKhanX](https://ficsit.app/mod/BEjGWQ4mL2jmxP)
The Converter is available once you complete the S.A.M. Research Tree, and can make any raw material from S.A.M. Ingots (which, in turn, can be made with S.A.M. Ore and any raw material).
The Converter is not cheap. In fact, the price may be too high for some people.
It does have a couple bugs yet, but it works.

item.title: My First Mod(tm): S.A.M. in the M.A.M
